last_episode_to_air.name: The One with Meltdown and a Murder
last_episode_to_air.overview: Todd Barry, Brent Sullivan, Charla Lauriston and Mike O'Brien perform.

name: The Meltdown with Jonah and Kumail
original_name: The Meltdown with Jonah and Kumail
overview: It's not just a comic book store; it's a comics store -- where the most-acclaimed talent gather for a night of comedy, on-stage and off. Join hosts Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjani as they give you an all-access pass to the hottest stand-up scene in town.

episodes.name: The One with the Childhood Crushes
episodes.overview: Steve Agee, David Koechner, Neal Brennan and Moshe Kasher join hosts Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani for a night of stand-up in the back of a comic book store.

episodes.name: The One with the Party Fouls
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani describe the worst party fouls they've committed and host stand-up from Emily Heller, Eugene Mirman, Jon Daly, Nick Offerman and T.J. Miller.

episodes.name: The One with the Worst Jobs
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani discuss the worst jobs they've ever had and host performances from Marc Maron, James Adomian, Chris Hardwick and Justin Willman.

episodes.name: The One with the Travel Stories
episodes.overview: Pete Holmes, Garfunkel and Oates, Brody Stevens and Rory Scovel join hosts Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani for a night of stand-up and horrible travel stories.

episodes.name: The One with the TV Host Perks
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani welcome Jared Logan, John Hodgman, Todd Glass and "Weird Al" Yankovic as well as a few surprise guests who know what it's like to have a TV show.

episodes.name: The One With Betrayal
episodes.overview: Kumail Nanjiani and Jonah Ray discuss revenge and betrayal and host stand-up from Paul Scheer and Rob Huebel, Doug Benson, Jim Gaffigan and Eric Andre.

episodes.name: The One With the Wedding Stories
episodes.overview: Hosts Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani help the audience find love with performances by Maria Bamford, Gabe Liedman and Jenny Slate, Michael Ian Black and Reggie Watts.

episodes.name: The One With the Horror Stories
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani discuss their favorite horror movies and feature stand-up by Tom Lennon, Adam Cayton-Holland, Tom Wilson and Kyle Kinane.

episodes.name: The One With the Replacement Hosts
episodes.overview: Andy Daly, Cameron Esposito, Hampton Yount, and Abbi & Ilana are featured on the show.

episodes.name: The One with the Jacket
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani discuss Kumail's fancy new jacket; comics Sean Patton, Matt Braunger, Claudia O'Doherty, Adam Pally and Gil Ozeri.

episodes.name: The One With the Little Girl Named Lucy
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani apologize to a young audience member; comics John Mulaney, Brent Weinbach and Brett Gelman perform.

episodes.name: The One With the Kiss; Will They Won't They Finally Answered
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani test their relationship; Bridget Everett, Jak Knight, Thomas Middleditch and Kurt Braunohler perform.

episodes.name: The One With All the Spitting
episodes.overview: Comics Nick Thune, Andrew Santino, John Early and Fred Armisen join Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani for a night of stand-up and spit-takes in the back of a comic book store

episodes.name: The One With the Clearance Issues
episodes.overview: Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani welcome Aparna Nancherla, Ron Funches, Al Madrigal and Chelsea Peretti.

episodes.name: The One Where Hannibal Looks Like Miami
episodes.overview: Hannibal Buress, Kate Berlant and Paul Scheer perform; Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani reminisce about their many failed romances.

episodes.name: The One With Coco
episodes.overview: Comics include Joe Mande, Lauren Lapkus, Beth Stelling, and Natasha Leggero.

episodes.name: The One with the Improv Troupe
episodes.overview: Jay Larson, Byron Bowers, Brian Posehn and Wild Horses (Stephanie Allynne, Mary Holland, Erin Whitehead and Lauren Lapkus) perform.

episodes.name: The One with the Box of Pain
episodes.overview: Paul F. Tompkins, David Wain, Michelle Buteau and BAKED (Steve Agee and Brendon Small) perform.

episodes.name: The One with More Dicks
episodes.overview: Maria Bamford, the Lucas Brothers, Martha Kelly and the Five Footprints (Joe DeRosa, Ron Funches, Drennon Davis, Rory Scovel) perform.

episodes.name: The One with the Hypnotic Herpes
episodes.overview: Solomon Georgio, Al Jackson and Jen Kirkman perform.

episodes.name: The One Without Neil DeGrasse Tyson
episodes.overview: Brandon Wardell, Sam Jay and Guy Branum perform.

episodes.name: The One with OCD. The One with OCD. The One with OCD.
episodes.overview: Rachel Bloom, Baron Vaughn and Ian Karmel perform.

episodes.name: The One with Tiny
episodes.overview: Rhea Butcher, Joel Kim Booster and Gelmania (Brett Gelman, John Gemberling and Cyrus Ghahremani) perform.

episodes.name: The One with Meltdown and a Murder
episodes.overview: Todd Barry, Brent Sullivan, Charla Lauriston and Mike O'Brien perform.
